text: East India is a station on Docklands Light Railway (DLR) in east London. It takes its name from the nearby former East India Docks of the Port of London, where ships trading with the Indian subcontinent used to dock. It is on the Beckton branch of the DLR, and is in Travelcard Zones 2 and 3. It opened, with the Beckton Branch, on 28 March 1994. == Other websites == *Docklands Light Railway website - East India station page Category:Docklands Light Railway stations Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets Category:London Travelcard zone 2 Category:London Travelcard zone 3
title: East India DLR station
